content: get ready for the bounty of summer with this origami-inspired market bag the weekend wanderer mesh bento bag is made from a simple rectangle with a bit of folding and twisting all you need to know if how to work a double_crochet mesh and a few simple sewing skills that makes this project great for beginners or for those looking for a simple tv+crochet weekend project ……………………………………………………………………………… patterns are written in us crochet terminology and is available only in english ……………………………………………………………………………… making finished items you can sell finished products made from this pattern by giving credit to me as the designer and linking to the original blog post pattern please be respectful and do not sell or distribute this pattern in any way especially as your own instead share the original blog post link ……………………………………………………………………………… return policy there are no returns on digital files please contact me with any further questions ……………………………………………………………………………… thanks for browsing find me at website - www 1dogwoof com instagram - www instagram com/1dogwoof facebook - www facebook com/onedogwoof youtube - www youtube com/1dogwoof pinterest - www pinterest com/1dogwoof twitter - www twitter com/1dogwoof
